How we began our educational
JOURNEY
We began our educational journey realizing on the one hand the volume and responsibilities of the project and on the other the joy that gives us the opportunity to continue our research in the demanding art of dance, accompanied by great dedicated artists who have left their mark. in the Greek dancing scene.
The need for renewal and modernization of dance education with the requirements of the time, the willingness to meet young people who are taking their first steps in the world of artistic expression and especially the challenge to organize a curriculum that sets goals, is shaped according to needs , disciplines without imposing and strengthens individuality through cooperation, are what pushed us to establish Aktina.

  • PROFESSIONAL CLASSES

    The curiculum in Aktina includes technical and theoretical courses according to the instructions given by the Ministry of Culture, as well as additional seminars that are organized throughout the school year and complement the basic education.

  • OPEN CLASSES

    The afternoon classes in Aktina includes classical ballet, contempory dance and imporvisation classes for beginers as well as preparation clases for the exams of the Ministry of Culture which are suitable for those who have experience with the techniques of classical and contemporary dance as well as for professional dancers and dance students.

  • GALLERY

    Gallery contains images and videos from performances and various activities held by Aktina Dance School.

  • ACTIVIES

    Activities contains all the recent events, like seminars and performances held by Aktina Dance School.
